Text: That voice...!

When No. 559 turns around...there stands the
master she adores.

M-Master Shadow...?! It's really you, isn't it,
Master Shadow...?!
...Yes.

My deepest apologies! I had no idea it was you,
Master Shadow. I can't believe I nearly tried to
strike you...

But what are you doing here...?! Could it be that
the base was also your doingâ€”
Are you really asking me that?
M-My apologies! I did not mean to pry...

...You were a step too late. I already had my eye on
the place.
(So...Master Shadow already knew about that base?!)

(He didn't take action until now because he was
testing the Shadow Garden's capabilities.)

(But perhaps he grew impatient with our lack of
action and chose to intervene himself...?!)

I am terribly sorry! I should never have bothered
you like this when you're so busy! It's utterly
inexcusable!
...Enough. You may go.

B-But...! I wish to offer my assistance to make
amends for having caused you trouble...
Didn't you hear me? I don't need your help.
Huh... What did you say...?
(Master Shadow...doesn't need me...?)

(I understand I'm not powerful enough yet, but I
believed I was special, just like the Seven Shadows
who received their power directly from him...)
(But if not, then what...what am Iâ€”)
(...What am I doing this all for...?)
Now's my chance to slip away... Huh?
...Mmnn... What happened to me...?
Oh, good. You're awake.
Huh? Um...M-Master Shadow...?!
Easy now. Don't get up too fast.
M-My apologies!! I was just so startled...

(Ohhh... That beautifully lustrous jet-black hair...
Those eyes filled with sorrow yet emanating
strength...)

(Master Shadow is gazing only at me with those
eyes...!)
What's wrong? Still feeling unwell?

N-No! Have you been watching over me this whole
time after I fainted?

Well, it's dangerous around here with monsters
and all. And besidesâ€”

Master Shadow looks down at his clothes. No. 559's
hand is gripping the hem of his slime-made coat.

Have I been holding onto you all this time while I
was unconscious...? I truly don't know how to
apologize...!

No, it's fine, really. I was more surprised you
suddenly collapsed.

That was due to my dismay at having incurred your
wrath...
My wrath? Why would you think I'm upset?

Y-You're not upset...?! Then why did you say I
wasn't needed...?

That was just an excuse to retrieve the gold coins
from that guy over thereâ€”

...Ahem. Anyway, I'm glad you're okay. I should be
heading back.

W-Wait, please. If you're not angry with me then...
perhaps we could go...together...
Together?
...I...I'd like to go back...with you.

With me? Oh right, it might be problematic if you
fainted on the way back.
Hmm. Okay.

Really?! I will never forget this day. I will
engrave it upon my soul!

Well, if one of Alpha's girls went missing,
that would be an issue as well.
Wait, don't pull so hard on my coatâ€”hey!
Stop, you're going to tear it! Did I do something?!

Despite twists and turns, No. 559 and Shadow end up
returning together...
I see. So the Garden does joint training, huh?
Yes. Unfortunately, I was no match for Lady Zeta.

Joint training... Sounds like some kinda camp.
There they go again, having fun without me...
Master Shadow?

No, it's nothing. So, you fought Zeta, huh? She's a
tough opponent, so don't be too hard on yourself.

Indeed, she was tough... She evaded every attack
with ease...

I've never met anyone with such finesse before.
Her instinct is outstandingâ€”definitely a natural.

Still, that's no excuse for my defeat. If I can't
beat her, then I need to train even harder.

If my abilities are lacking, it's because my own
efforts haven't been enough. I need to practice my
swordsmanship more, build up my physical strengthâ€”

Okay, stop, stop. I may not know the full situation,
but I think it's pointless to keep pushing yourself
without any strategy.
Pointless...

Of course, you've gotta put in the work, but it's no
good if you're just mindlessly training. You've
gotta also use your head sometimes.
For example, sure, Zeta is tough, but...

As Shadow shares his advice, No. 559's face
lights up with understanding.
...Right, I see.

Such sharp insight, my lord. With this, I might just
stand a chance against Zeta.

I can't guarantee it'll work out as I've suggested,
but...well, good luck.

To be given not just advice but also words of
encouragement... I am truly grateful!

I'll broaden my horizons and dedicate myself to
personal growth.

Dedicate yourself... You're a serious one, aren't
you? But I like that.
What...?!

You don't blame your losses on other people's
talents, and you continue to strive to be better.
I respect that attitude.

(F-For a moment, I thought he said he likes me,
but he meant my attitude... It's not quite the same,
but...)

(I-I can't believe Master Shadow complimented me
directly...!
Heheh...heheheh...!
H-Hey...! If you pull on my coat like that, it'll...

The hem of Cid's coat, which No. 559 has been
pulling, tears off spectacularly.

Oh... M-My apologies...! I will make amends, even if
it takes me my entire life...

No, no, it's okay. What's done is done. Besides,
it's slime, so I can fix it in no time.
And I have the gold coins from earlierâ€”
Gold coins?

...Well then, I shall take my leave. As for what
happened here...
It's our little secret.
Our...little secret...?!
H-He's gone... But why all the secrecy...oh!

(If news of this incident reaches the Garden, my
reputation will be negatively affected for having
troubled him.)

(Could he have insisted on secrecy out of concern
for me...?)

(Ohh... Master Shadow, what a merciful man... I'm
more determined than ever to devote myself entirely
to himâ€”)
...Hm? What's this...a gold coin? Whose...?
Seven...eight...nine... Hmm, still one short.

I dropped it somewhere... It must've been when my
coat tore. *sigh* There go my future funds...

(No, no, getting greedy isn't good. Today was like
lucking out and finding a bonus stage. Yup, yup.
If you're a thief, your treasure is my treasure!)

(Running into that girl from the Garden was
unexpected...but since I managed to pick up the
coins while she was out, it all worked out.)

(And she's so earnest. She nodded like crazy when
I told her to keep it a secret.)

(With her silence secured, Alpha and the others
shouldn't catch on to the fact that I'm beating up
thieves for their gold.)
Hold on, that girl...

Ah, I remember now. That was Victoria! I thought she
looked familiar!
